info.name: Leaderboard API Collection
info.description: API collection for Leaderboard endpoints - Get top 10 users by State, Taluka, and District. All endpoints require JWT authentication and support optional farmer_id filter.

item.name: Leaderboard APIs

query.description: Optional: Filter to show only users with farmer_id

request.description: Get top 10 users by record count across the entire state. Requires JWT authentication. The registered_lgd_code is extracted from the JWT token. Optional farmer_id query parameter filters results to only show users with farmer IDs.

query.description: Optional: Filter to show only users with farmer_id

request.description: Get top 10 users by record count within the same taluka as the authenticated user. Requires JWT authentication. The registered_lgd_code is extracted from the JWT token to determine the taluka. Optional farmer_id query parameter filters results to only show users with farmer IDs.

query.description: Optional: Filter to show only users with farmer_id

request.description: Get top 10 users by record count within the same district as the authenticated user. Requires JWT authentication. The registered_lgd_code is extracted from the JWT token to determine the district. Optional farmer_id query parameter filters results to only show users with farmer IDs.

item.description: Endpoints for retrieving leaderboard data - top 10 users by state, taluka, and district based on record count
